name: Trampoline 8FT 10FT 12FT 14FT 16FT, Outdoor Trampolines for Kids and Adults, Recreational Trampoline with Enclosure Net & Ladder, Round Trampolines ASTM Approved
short_description: 【ASTM Approved & Curved Poles】Our backyard trampolines are ASTM certified. We maintain a safe distance between the curved trampoline poles and the enclosure net to prevent any user from hitting the poles while jumping.

【Gapless & Tightly-woven Enclosure】The jumping pad is tightly integrated with the spring cover to prevent the feet from getting caught in the spring during use, ensuring a safe and enjoyable bouncing experience. The tightly-woven polyethylene enclosure net provides UV protection.

【Durable Frames & Legs】Our outdoor trampolines have galvanized stainless steel frames, ensuring durability, weather resistance, and rust prevention. Supported by four evenly spaced W-shaped legs, our exercise trampoline provides optimal stability and support.
【Considerate Design】Our 12ft trampoline has 72 strong springs for powerful bouncing and includes a ladder and durable double-sided zippers for safe and easy access.
【All in One Box】One box contains all parts for our recreational trampolines, reducing wait time and the chance of missing accessories. Enjoy quick installation and immediate jumping fun.

short_description: DESIGNED WITH SECURITY IN MIND: The Bestway Xtreme Air Kids Outdoor Trampoline features a no-gap, sewn enclosure net with a L-shaped zippered and buckled entry, and foam-padded enclosure poles for extra protection and cushioning, ensuring a secure and enjoyable bouncing experience for kids ages 6 and up.

INCLUDES: 1 Trampoline, 1 Spring-Loading Tool, 4 Anchors, 8 Foot Pads. XTREME AIR TRAMPOLINE: Measures 10 ft. x 8 ft. 4 in. 2-year limited warranty on trampoline frame. name: Gigu 10FT 12FT 14FT 15FT 16FT Recreational Trampolines with Enclosure Net and Ladder and Anti-Rust Coating, ASTM Approved Trampoline Outdoor for Kids and Adults Outdoor Yard Trampolines
short_description: 【Safety is Top Priority】All GIGU trampolines have successfully passed both CPSIA and ASTM F381-16 safety standards. The CPSIA test ensures that the trampoline materials are free from harmful heavy metals like lead and phthalates, making them safe for children. The ASTM F381-16 standard provides strict guidelines for structural integrity, component quality, assembly, labeling, and overall product safety—offering families peace of mind with every bounce.

【More Durable Trampoline】Our 10 FT trampoline outdoor boasts a durable frame made from weather resistant, rust proof galvanized steel. In addition, the U legs are coated with a premium black protective layer that not only elevates the overall look but also enhances rust resistance and weather durability.

【High-Performance Jumping Mat】This outdoor yard trampoline is equipped with a premium jumping mat that’s UV-resistant, waterproof, and fade-resistant for long-lasting performance. Reinforced with heavy-duty stitching, the mat offers superior durability and elasticity, providing a strong, stable bounce with every jump.

【Safe Curved Poles Design】Recreational Trampoline for kids and adults feature specially engineered curved safety poles wrapped in thick, high-density foam to create a safer jumping environment.The curved design increases the distance between the poles and the jumping area, effectively reducing the risk of accidental collisions. Making every jump safer and more secure

【Upgraded Heavy-Duty Springs】Crafted from high-tensile galvanized steel for superior strength, rust resistance, and long-lasting bounce. Designed to deliver optimal stretch and recoil for a smoother, more responsive jumping experience.

【Easy to Assemble】TWO Package Get all Accessories.Safety enclosure net, new upgraded anti-skid ladder, U-shaped base ,Springs and so on.We offer Step-by-Step Manual and assembly videos. Quick assembly of two adults at the same time.
